import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Reviews extends Component { state = { reviews: [ { text: 'TalkingThread is a great way to communicate with your team! Guys, you are the best', author: 'Michael Smith', starsNum: 5 }, { text: 'TalkingThread is one of those programs that I said to myself "how did I live without this"?', author: 'Alisa', starsNum: 5 }, { text: 'It is free, easy-to-use tool for messaging, video and audio conferences, and screensharing"', author: 'Michael Smith', starsNum: 5 } ] }; render() { let reviews = this.state.reviews.map((review, index) => { return (

  • {review.text}

    M {review.author}
    • ); }); return (

    What our customers are saying

      {/*

    • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dicta officiis quam in, soluta vero quisquam cum deleniti. Sequi, consectetur.

      MMichael Smith

    • Dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Amet explicabo ratione dolores officia nesciunt dolorum laborum! Fuga, est odio?

      JJohn Doe
    • */} {/*

      Consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequuntur veniam aspernatur eveniet eius dicta nobis necessitatibus beatae vel, dolore quo temporibus, et ea.

      OOlivia Stone
      • */} {reviews}
    ); } } export default Reviews;
